column5: Any movie buff knows Mickey Rooney  He just passed away at 93  As a horse guy I really enjoyed "The Black Stallion"----which had a lot of it filmed between Toronto and Fort Erie Racetrack
Wow and just Read Comedian John Pinette also just died  Comedy took a hit yesterday
Sad,but he had a great career and lived a long life.RIP Mick
Yeah----we'll be lucky to live that long---good run
